item.title: Say no to DNA based surveillance: On the report on the DNA Bill
item.description: As a follow up to our analysis and outreach on the Report of the Standing Committee on the DNA Bill, 2019, we have written to the Department of Biotechnology. In our letter, we highlighted our concerns regarding privacy and surveillance, and asked that the Bill be redrafted.

item.title: DNA Bill : On democratic processes and dystopian outcomes #IFFExplainer #SaveOurPrivacy
item.description: The Standing Committee on Science and Technology recently submitted its report on the DNA Bill. Several concerns have been raised over the report, with two Committee members filing dissent notes. We decided to provide an explainer that breaks down the key issues with both the report and the Bill.
